channel.title: Unsere Arbeiten on Ura Design
channel.description: Recent content in Unsere Arbeiten on Ura Design
channel.copyright: Einige Rechte vorbehalten. Sofern nicht anders angegeben, steht der Inhalt dieser Seite unter einer Creative-Commons-Lizenz.

item.title: Rallly - Rebranding & User Research
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We redesigned Rallly’s identity, delivering a fresh look and offered strategic UX recommendations for an improved user experience.

item.title: Tumpa - Desktop App & Landing page
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We transformed Tumpa’s identity and interface, ensuring intuitive interactions and clear pathways for OpenPGP key management.

item.title: Open Technology Fund - Website Illustrations
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We created a fresh visual style, offering a series of illustrations for the OTF’s new website. These visuals highlight the importance of open technology and, most importantly, the community. They enhance OTF’s website, providing a visually engaging user experience.

item.title: Internews SaferJourno
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We designed a distinct visual narrative for Internews SaferJourno, from the visual identity inception to a dedicated web platform for journalism trainers.

item.title: Open Technology Fund - Annual Report
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We designed the layout of the OTF Annual Report, creating a consistent visual language which emphasizes their motive, principles and style.

item.title: PrototypeFund - Virtual Demo Week
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: Wir haben eine virtuelle Demo-Woche entwickelt, um Projekte aus den Runden 7-10 des deutschen Prototype Fund die Möglichkeit zu geben, ihre Arbeit in einer virtuellen Umgebung zu präsentieren.

item.title: AsciiDoc
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: AsciiDoc is a plain text markup language for writing technical content. We were approached by the AsciiDoc working group to create a coherent brand identity and website to serve as the home for the AsciiDoc language.

item.title: Totem Project
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: Totem is an online learning platform that offers educational courses about digital security and privacy in a safe, online classroom environment. We helped them refresh their visual identity and explain technical concepts in a more visual way.

item.title: Stackspin
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: Stackspin, previously known as OpenAppStack, is a purpose-aligned work suite tailored for mission-driven teams. It delivers top-tier apps in open source cloud collaboration: set up with a single click, effortlessly managed, and fortified with security. Stackspin is built and managed by Greenhost.

item.title: CalyxOS
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We provided a new visual style for CalyxOS, concretized into graphics to illustrate their main concepts and new wallpaper images for the Operating System.

item.title: Internews’ ADAPT
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We designed the full visual identity for Internews’ ADAPT, creating a style to graphically represent ADAPT everywhere.

item.title: Internews’ OPTIMA
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We designed the brand and visual identity for OPTIMA, creating a visual language which emphasizes their motive, principles and style.

item.title: Oxidize - The Conference of embedded Rust
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We created the brand and visual identity for Oxidize, designing every digital and print asset for the conference and providing a long-term design solution.

item.title: Thunderbird
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We created the new Thunderbird brand and helped the project with extensive usability research.

item.title: I2P - The Invisible Internet Project
item.author: hello@ura.design (Ura Design)
item.description: We helped I2P create their new brand strategy, visual identity and shape the user experience of their browser extension for Firefox.
